ABOUT ME

Baha Alden Hasim

Junior Full-Stack Web Developer & Photographer.

I am Junior Web Developer, Coming from a background in Photography, I love creating pages where I’m able to actually create enjoyable interactions and experiences for everyone!
I've Coding for couple months.
I plan to make a creative Websites once I learn more.
I'm very interested in mobile devices as well.
I was nervous about coding but i now feel more confident each day.

Languages and Tools I´m currently learning, (HTML5), (CSS3-SASS), Git, JavaScript.

In the Previous i was Petroleum Engineer with experience in advanced drilling solutions, petroleum refinery operations, and implementation of Petroleum processes.

Hire Junior HTML Developer to elevate your Brand with an out of Box Ideas, Appealing & user-friendly web portals at your doorstep with HTML and CSS, the two most vital ingredients of any design. Hire Junior HTML developer to design eye-catching websites for your business.

Digital
Photography

You don’t take a photograph. You ask quietly to borrow it. Photography is a way of feeling, of touching, of loving. What you have caught on film is captured forever… It remembers little things, long after you have forgotten everything. Taking an image, freezing a moment, reveals how rich reality truly is. In photography there is a reality so subtle that it becomes more real than reality.
